aboutCompany.title: About company
aboutCompany.text: KickAider is an employee time tracking system. The agent is installed on a computer once and runs in the background, collecting activity data: which apps and websites are open, mouse movement, and keyboard activity. Managers see everything in a convenient web dashboard — anytime, from any device.
aboutCompany.description: We created KickAider for teams that value transparency: no real-time surveillance, only objective data about working time.

features.title: Increase team productivity
features.description: See how work time is actually used. KickAider automatically collects data and turns it into clear reports — without surveys, spreadsheets, or guesswork.

basicReports.title: Basic reports
basicReports.description: Company-wide analytics: top apps and websites, active vs idle time ratio. Filter by departments and employees.

activityHistory.title: Activity history
activityHistory.description: Minute-level timeline for every employee. Screenshots are captured automatically when switching apps — so you can always reconstruct the day.

ratingAndDetails.title: Ratings and daily details
ratingAndDetails.description: Employee efficiency ranking and detailed breakdown of each workday: arrival time, active time, and apps used.

insightsAndRecommendations.title: Insights and recommendations
insightsAndRecommendations.description: The system detects productivity patterns, highlights time-loss areas, and provides actionable recommendations to improve team efficiency.

carousel.title: Everything under control — in real time
carousel.text: Employee online statuses, alerts about lateness or long idle time, and timesheets with charts — KickAider gives a complete picture without extra effort.

clients.title: Trusted by companies
clients.text: KickAider is used by companies that value honest time tracking — without complex setup or IT departments.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about KickAider.

questions.question: How does KickAider track employee activity?
questions.answer: The KickAider agent is installed on an employee’s computer and runs in the background collecting activity data: open apps, visited websites, mouse movement, and keyboard activity. Data is sent to a secure manager dashboard.

questions.question: Do I need to install anything on a computer?
questions.answer: Yes, a small KickAider agent must be installed on each employee’s computer. Installation takes a few minutes and requires no special skills. After installation, the agent runs silently in the background.

questions.question: Can I see employee activity in real time?
questions.answer: No, KickAider is not designed for real-time surveillance. The system collects data during the day and generates reports available anytime. This helps maintain trust within teams.

questions.question: What data does KickAider collect?
questions.answer: The system records which apps and websites are used, usage duration, mouse and keyboard activity, arrival and leave time, breaks, and idle periods. Optional automatic screenshots can be enabled.

questions.question: Can I exclude certain apps or websites?
questions.answer: Yes, you can specify apps and websites that should not be included in reports. This allows flexible configuration based on your team’s workflow.

questions.question: How often is data updated?
questions.answer: Data is updated every 10 minutes. Managers can view up-to-date statistics anytime — no manual sync required.

questions.question: Can KickAider be used for remote teams?
questions.answer: Yes, KickAider works perfectly for remote teams. It tracks work time regardless of location as long as the agent is installed.

questions.question: How does KickAider improve productivity?
questions.answer: KickAider shows how work time is actually spent. Managers see where time is lost, which tasks take longer, and how processes can be optimized to improve efficiency.

questions.question: Which operating systems are supported?
questions.answer: The KickAider agent works on Windows, macOS, and Linux. The web dashboard is accessible from any device with internet access.

questions.question: How does KickAider ensure data privacy?
questions.answer: All data is transmitted via secure channels and stored on protected servers. Only authorized users with proper permissions can access it. We comply with data protection regulations.
